newsitem.title: HONG KONG: PT Hexindo completes US$37 mln loan.
newsitem.headline: PT Hexindo completes US$37 mln loan.

text.p: PT Hexindo Adiperkasa had signed a US$37 million term loan/revolving credit facility with 20 financial institutions, arranger Sanwa Bank's Singapore branch said on Thursday.
The facility has a maturity of three years and pays a margin of 180 basis points over the Singapore Interbank Offered Rate.
Arranger and senior manager Sanwa Bank's Singapore branch committed to US$5 million.

Senior managers are Daiwa Bank's Singapore branch, Royal Bank of Scotland's Singapore branch and Standard Chartered Bank's Singapore branch, with US$5 million each, and Bank of Taiwan's Singapore branch, Banque Francaise du Commerce Exterieur's Singapore branch, Oversea-Chinese Banking Corp, Sakura Bank's Singapore branch and Tat Lee Bank, with US$3 million each.
Manager Toyo Trust and Banking Co's Singapore branch committed to US$2 million.
